data.title: rimshot
data.meta_description: Define rimshot. rimshot synonyms, rimshot pronunciation, rimshot translation, English dictionary definition of rimshot. also rim shot n. 1. A sharp sound produced by simultaneously striking the rim and the head of a drum with a drumstick. 2. A quick, abrupt drumroll followed...
data.text:
